name: typescript-express-jwt
description: Boilerplate code for TypeScript Express application with JWT authentication, TypeORM and PostgreSQL

scripts.migration:generate: npm run build && npm run typeorm -- migration:generate -f dist/migrations/config/ormConfig.js -n
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && npm run typeorm -- migration:run -f dist/migrations/config/ormConfig.js
scripts.migration:revert: npm run build && npm run typeorm -- migration:revert -f dist/migrations/config/ormConfig.js
